prompt:
Nurse: That's wonderful to hear. Having a support system during your recovery is very important. If there's anything else you need, don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're here to support you every step of the way. Do you have any other questions or concerns?

Patient: I do have a question, Rachel. If you don't mind,

Nurse: Of course, Of course, I don't mind at all. What's your question?

Patient: Can arthritis affect other parts of the body besides joints

Nurse: Yes, arthritis can indeed affect other parts of the body besides joints. There are many different types of arthritis, and some can affect other parts of the body in addition to the joints. For example, rheumatoid arthritis can affect the skin, eyes, lungs, heart, and blood vessels. Psoriatic arthritis is associated with psoriasis, a skin condition. Lupus, an autoimmune disease, can also affect various parts of the body, including the joints, skin, kidneys, blood cells, heart, and lungs. It's critical to discuss any concerns or symptoms with your doctor, who can provide a proper diagnosis and treatment plan. Do you have any other questions or concerns?

Patient: No. Thank you for your answers and your help today.

Nurse: You're welcome. I'm glad I could help. Before we end the call, let's quickly summarize what you still need to do before your procedure. You'll need to use the chlorhexidine scrub the night before and the morning of your procedure. Remember not to eat or drink anything after midnight before your procedure. Can I count on you to do all of this?

Patient: Yes.

responses.gpt4: Great! Remember, I'm here for you every step of the way. You can call me back at any time if you have questions. The callback number is 641-381-6523. Thank you for your time today, and I hope you enjoy the sunny weather and your baking plans with your daughter.
responses.our_model: That's great to hear. Remember, we're here for you every step of the way. If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to call us back at any time.
